analyzed: yon tan dbang bo blo gros rgyal ba'i yum //
translated: He will be of priestly descent, and his light will extend for eighteen yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Lord of Qualities;🔽the m other of the Jina will be called Intellect of the Lord of Qualities.

original: sras po dpag ldan tshogs dbang rim gro pa //
analyzed: sras po dpag ldan tshogs dbang rim gro pa //

analyzed: rdo rje byin yin gsal ba rim gro pa //

translated: The one of fine intelligence will be known as Aspiration; the one w ith m iraculous abilities will be known as Meditation on the Scriptures.

original: bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gsum gsum yod //
analyzed: bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gsum gsum yod //
translated: He will hold eight assemblies, each num bering seventy-three times ten million of those who have reached the state of no-m ore-learning.

original: mi tshe lo grangs dag ni khri yang yin //
analyzed: mi tshe lo grangs dag ni khri yang yin //

original: rgyal ba yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
analyzed: rgyal ba yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang //

analyzed: dam chos lo grangs drug khri'i bar du gnas // rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni gcig yin te //

original: yul ni bsod nams phung po zhas kyang bya //
analyzed: yul ni bsod nams phung po zhas kyang bya //

analyzed: rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad // dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni phung po bzang //

original: yon tan me tog rdul dang bral ba'i yum //
analyzed: yon tan me tog rdul dang bral ba'i yum //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Fine Aggregate; the m other of the Jina will be known as Flower of Virtue, Free from Dust.

analyzed: phung po sras yin ri rab rim gro pa // yon tan dag gis brgyan pa mkhas pa ste //

analyzed: nyi shu rtsa gnyis bar du gnas par 'gyur // 'jig rten phan pa'i phyir ni rgyal ba de'i //
